ants.state
Enum Ants

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Ants>
      ants.state.Ants
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Ants>
public enum Ants
extends java.lang.Enum<Ants>

Container class for the game state. Provides access to game metadata (such as turnTime, startTime, ...) as well as access to information about the world (via World), the ants (via Population), the orders (via Orders), and the Clustering of the map.

Author:
kases1, kustl1

setup

public void setup(int loadTime,
                  int turnTime,
                  int rows,
                  int cols,
                  int turns,
                  int viewRadius2,
                  int attackRadius2,
                  int spawnRadius2)
Creates new Ants object.

Parameters:
loadTime - timeout for initializing and setting up the bot on turn 0
turnTime - timeout for a single game turn, starting with turn 1
rows - game map height
cols - game map width
turns - maximum number of turns the game will be played
viewRadius2 - squared view radius of each ant
attackRadius2 - squared attack radius of each ant
spawnRadius2 - squared spawn radius of each ant
